titles.title: To provide for the processes and procedures for the granting, denying, or revoking of access, or eligibility for access, to classified information.
To provide for the processes and procedures for the granting, denying, or revoking of access, or eligibility for access, to classified information.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This bill prohibits access to classified information from being granted, denied, or revoked except according to established processes and procedures.
